title: Virgin Billionaire
description: A Curvy Girl and Virgin Billionaire Romantic ComedyWhat happens when a bridesmaid who has sworn off sex meets a virgin billionaire groomsman?THE INEXPERIENCED BACHELOR series are short, sweet, and steamy standalone romantic comedies about curvy women who fall for hot virgin guys. No cheating. No cliffhangers. HEA guaranteed.
author: Lana Dash
